title: Collection of programs PortableApps v.12.1 ML - AppzDam
description:
For more info visit :

A collection of new portable software, united into a single shell for easy quick start. The finished collection already includes programs such categories as: security, graphics and images, Internet, music and video, education, office, design, special features, utilities, and games. Everything is pre-configured to work portable. It suffices to install the assembly in the desired location on the portable device can operate.
The shell has a convenient intuitive menu.
Any fine tuning of the shell with which you can easily customize any of these items for themselves.
Support for many languages.
All programs are categorized.
In the settings you can select your favorite theme.
All applications can be kept up to date simply by clicking Applications-> Check for updates.
You can also configure Auto-possible application updates every time you start the shell.
You can add your application indicating the desired category.
You can quickly find a desired application in the list, using the search function.
Most of the applications at startup "pick up" the language of your system.
And much more..
